name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert HARES, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert HARES, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 25th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Robert HARES, Petitioner
